Description:
Adversaries may use a non-application layer protocol for communication between host and C2 server or among infected hosts within a network

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Netcat The Powershell Version
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (data like '%powercat %' or data like '%powercat.ps1%')
